jasperReport.name: Formato3_18
jasperReport.queryString:
SELECT -- tÃ­tulo de reporte (SELECT p.name FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) as periodo, (SELECT CASE WHEN $P{AD_Org_ID}=0 THEN ci.taxid ELSE oi.taxid END FROM ad_orginfo oi JOIN ad_clientinfo ci on ci.ad_client_id = oi.ad_client_id AND ci.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} LIMIT 1) as ruc, (SELECT CASE WHEN $P{AD_Org_ID}=0 THEN c.description ELSE o.description END FROM ad_org o JOIN ad_client c on c.ad_client_id = o.ad_client_id AND c.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} LIMIT 1) as cliente, (SELECT o.name FROM ad_org o WHERE o.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} ) as organizacion, (SELECT acc.name FROM c_acctschema acc WHERE acc.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID}) as esquema,
-- saldo inicial ((SELECT SUM(f.amtacctdr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND p.c_year_id = (SELECT p.c_year_id FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) AND p.periodno < (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) - (SELECT SUM(f.amtacctcr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND p.c_year_id = (SELECT p.c_year_id FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) AND p.periodno < (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))) as inicial,
--cobranza de ventas ((SELECT SUM(f.amtacctdr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on f.record_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow on py.c_cashflow_group_id = flow.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_allocationline allo on f.record_id = allo.c_allocationhdr_id LEFT JOIN c_payment po on allo.c_payment_id = po.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow2 on po.c_cashflow_group_id = flow2.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_cashline ch on f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = flow3.c_cashflow_group_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (flow.value = 'OP+01' OR flow2.value = 'OP+01' OR flow3.value = 'OP+01') AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))- (SELECT SUM(f.amtacctcr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on f.record_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow on py.c_cashflow_group_id = flow.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_allocationline allo on f.record_id = allo.c_allocationhdr_id LEFT JOIN c_payment po on allo.c_payment_id = po.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow2 on po.c_cashflow_group_id = flow2.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_cashline ch on f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = flow3.c_cashflow_group_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (flow.value = 'OP+01' OR flow2.value = 'OP+01' OR flow3.value = 'OP+01') AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))) as cob_vent,
--cobranza regalias ((SELECT SUM(f.amtacctdr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on f.record_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow on py.c_cashflow_group_id = flow.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_allocationline allo on f.record_id = allo.c_allocationhdr_id LEFT JOIN c_payment po on allo.c_payment_id = po.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow2 on po.c_cashflow_group_id = flow2.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_cashline ch on f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = flow3.c_cashflow_group_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (flow.value = 'OP+02' OR flow2.value = 'OP+02' OR flow3.value = 'OP+02') AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))- (SELECT SUM(f.amtacctcr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on f.record_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow on py.c_cashflow_group_id = flow.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_allocationline allo on f.record_id = allo.c_allocationhdr_id LEFT JOIN c_payment po on allo.c_payment_id = po.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow2 on po.c_cashflow_group_id = flow2.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_cashline ch on f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = flow3.c_cashflow_group_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (flow.value = 'OP+02' OR flow2.value = 'OP+02' OR flow3.value = 'OP+02') AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))) as cob_regal,
--cobranza intereses ((SELECT SUM(f.amtacctdr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = flow3.c_cashflow_group_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (flow.value = 'OP+03' OR flow2.value = 'OP+03' OR flow3.value = 'OP+03') AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))- (SELECT SUM(f.amtacctcr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on f.record_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow on py.c_cashflow_group_id = flow.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_allocationline allo on f.record_id = allo.c_allocationhdr_id LEFT JOIN c_payment po on allo.c_payment_id = po.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow2 on po.c_cashflow_group_id = flow2.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_cashline ch on f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))) as cob_int,

f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on f.record_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow on py.c_cashflow_group_id = flow.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_allocationline allo on f.record_id = allo.c_allocationhdr_id LEFT JOIN c_payment po on allo.c_payment_id = po.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))) as cob_otro,
--pago proveedores ((SELECT SUM(f.amtacctcr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = flow3.c_cashflow_group_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (flow.value = 'OP-01' OR flow2.value = 'OP-01' OR flow3.value = 'OP-01') AND = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on f.record_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow on $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (flow.value = 'OP-01' OR flow2.value = 'OP-01' OR flow3.value = 'OP-01') AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))) as pago_prov,
--pago remun ((SELECT SUM(f.amtacctcr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = flow3.c_cashflow_group_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (flow.value = 'OP-02' OR flow2.value = 'OP-02' OR flow3.value = 'OP-02') AND (CASE WHEN p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on f.record_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow on py.c_cashflow_group_id = po.c_cashflow_group_id = flow2.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_cashline ch on f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = flow3.c_cashflow_group_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (flow.value = 'OP-02' OR flow2.value = 'OP-02' OR flow3.value = 'OP-02') AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))) as pago_remun,

JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = flow3.c_cashflow_group_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND ((flow.value = 'OP+01' OR flow.value = 'OP+02' OR flow.value = 'OP+03' OR flow.value = 'OP+04' OR flow.value = 'OP-01' OR flow.value = 'OP-02' OR flow.value = 'OP-03' OR flow.value = 'OP-04' OR flow.value = 'OP-05') OR (flow2.value = 'OP+01' OR flow2.value = 'OP+02' OR flow2.value = 'OP+03' OR flow2.value = 'OP+04' OR flow2.value = 'OP-01' OR flow2.value = 'OP-02' OR flow2.value = 'OP-03' OR flow2.value = 'OP-04' OR flow2.value = 'OP-05') OR (flow3.value = 'OP+01' OR flow3.value = 'OP+02' OR flow3.value = 'OP+03' OR flow3.value = 'OP+04' OR flow3.value = 'OP-01' OR flow3.value = 'OP-02' OR flow3.value = 'OP-03' OR flow3.value = 'OP-04' OR flow3.value = 'OP-05')) AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))- (SELECT SUM(f.amtacctcr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN flow2.c_cashflow_group_id LEFT JOIN c_cashline ch on f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id LEFT JOIN c_cashflow_group flow3 on ch.c_cashflow_group_id = flow3.c_cashflow_group_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = 'OP+01' OR flow.value = 'OP+02' OR flow.value = 'OP+03' OR flow.value = 'OP+04' OR flow.value = 'OP-01' OR flow.value = 'OP-02' OR flow.value = 'OP-03' OR flow.value = 'OP-04' OR flow.value = 'OP-05') OR (flow2.value = 'OP+01' OR flow2.value = 'OP+02' OR flow2.value = 'OP+03' OR flow2.value = 'OP+04' OR flow2.value = 'OP-01' OR flow2.value = 'OP-02' OR flow2.value = 'OP-03' OR flow2.value = 'OP-04' OR flow2.value = 'OP-05') OR (flow3.value = 'OP+01' OR flow3.value = 'OP+02' OR flow3.value = 'OP+03' OR flow3.value = 'OP+04' OR flow3.value = 'OP-01' OR flow3.value = 'OP-02' OR flow3.value = 'OP-03' OR flow3.value = 'OP-04' OR flow3.value = 'OP-05')) AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))) as operacion,
--OTRO ((SELECT SUM(f.amtacctcr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on f.record_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_allocationline allo on f.record_id = allo.c_allocationhdr_id LEFT JOIN c_payment po on allo.c_payment_id = po.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashline ch on f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (cast (py.c_cashflow_group_id as character) is null OR cast (po.c_cashflow_group_id as character) is null OR cast (ch.c_cashflow_group_id as character) is null) AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))- (SELECT SUM(f.amtacctdr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on f.record_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_allocationline allo on f.record_id = allo.c_allocationhdr_id LEFT JOIN c_payment po on allo.c_payment_id = po.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_cashline ch on f.record_id = ch.c_cash_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (cast (py.c_cashflow_group_id as character) is null OR cast (po.c_cashflow_group_id as character) is null OR cast (ch.c_cashflow_group_id as character) is null) AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.periodno = (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))) as OTRO,
-- saldo final ((SELECT SUM(f.amtacctdr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.c_year_id = (SELECT p.c_year_id FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) AND p.periodno <= (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) - (SELECT SUM(f.amtacctcr) FROM fact_acct f JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN ad_client c on f.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on f.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id JOIN c_elementvalue ev on f.account_id = ev.c_elementvalue_id WHERE f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE f.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND ev.value like '10%' AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{DateAcct}, (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID})) = (SELECT enddate FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) THEN true ELSE f.dateacct <= $P{DateAcct} END) AND p.c_year_id = (SELECT p.c_year_id FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) AND p.periodno <= (SELECT p.periodno FROM c_period p WHERE p.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}))) as final

staticText.text: FORMATO 3.18 : "Libro de Inventarios y Balances - Estado de Flujos de Efectivo"
PERIODO
RUC
RAZÃN SOCIAL
FECHA
Ejercicio o Periodo
Actividades
Actividades de OperaciÃ³n:
Cobranza de venta de bienes oservicios e ingresos operacionales
Cobranza de regalÃ­as, honorarios, comisiones y otros
Cobranza de intereses y dividendos recibidos
Otros cobros de efectivo relativos a la actividad
Menos:
Pago a proveedores de bienes y servicios
Pago de remuneraciones y beneficios sociales
Pago de tributos
Otros pagos de efectivo relativos a la actividad
Aumento (DisminuciÃ³n) de Efectivo y Equivalente de Efectivo Provenientes de Act. de OperaciÃ³n
Actividades de InversiÃ³n:
Cobranza de venta de valores e inversiones permanentes
Cobranza de venta de inmuebles, maquinarioa y equipo
Cobranza de activos intangibles
Otros cobros de efectivo relativos a la actividad
Menos:
Pagos por compra de valores e inversiones permanentes
Pagos por compra de inmuebles, maquinaria y equipo
Pagos por compra de intangibles
Otros pagos de efectivo relativos a la actividad
Saldo Inicial
Pago de intereses y rendimientos
Aumento (DisminuciÃ³n) de Efectivo y Equivalente de Efectivo Provenientes de Act. de InversiÃ³n
Actividades de Financiamiento:
